headline: EXPEDIA GROUP EXPANDS B2B PLATFORM AND LAUNCHES GENAI PARTNERSHIPS TO ENHANCE TRAVEL DISCOVERY
summary: SEATTLE, May 14, 2025--Expedia Group today announced a major expansion of its B2B technology platform, launching new APIs and advertising innovations designed to power partner growth and unlock smarter traveler engagement. The company is also extending its reach with new GenAI-powered discovery experiences, starting with Expedia® Trip Matching, a first-of-its-kind feature that turns reels on Instagram into personalized travel recommendations.
